Change props on the fly. Press "e" when focused on the map to toggle the editor.

```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(deckgl)

data("sf_bike_parking")

deckgl(
  zoom = 11,
  pitch = 45,
  bearing = 35,
  width = "100%",
  style = list(background = "black")
) %>%
  add_grid_layer(
    data = sf_bike_parking,
    getPosition = ~lng + lat,
    visible = TRUE,
    extruded = TRUE,
    cellSize = 200,
    elevationScale = 4,
    colorRange = RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(6, "YlOrRd"),
    tooltip = "{{position.0}}, {{position.1}}<br/>Count: {{count}}"
  ) %>%
  add_control("Grid Layer") %>%
  add_json_editor(maxLines = 22, theme = "idle_fingers") #%>% add_basemap()
```
